original_text: But many of those who had heard the word believed, and the number of the men came to about five thousand.
korean_text: 말씀을 들은 사람 중에 믿는 자가 많으니 남자의 수가 약 오천이나 되었더라

sentences.original_text: But many of those who had heard the word believed
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 말씀을 들은 사람 중 많은 사람이 믿었으며

sentences.original_text: and the number of the men came to about five thousand
